SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands

Class TypeParserRegistry<S>

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands.TypeParserRegistry<S>
Type Parameters:
S - sender type
public class TypeParserRegistry<S> extends Object
Registry for managing type parsers that handle both parsing and suggestions.
